lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Trade Department officials said the improvement in Britain's current account contrasted with most private forecasts and they attributed much of the strength to imports rising less quickly in February than might otherwise have been expected.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Department said exceptionally cold weather in January reduced exports that month and that there had been an element of catching up in the February figures.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Department said the upward trend in non-oil export volume continues and the underlying level of non-oil import volume seems to have stablised.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Trade Department officials said the improvement in Britain's current account contrasted with most private forecasts and they attributed much of the strength to imports rising less quickly in February than might otherwise have been expected.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Department said exceptionally cold weather in January reduced exports that month and that there had been an element of catching up in the February figures.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Department said the upward trend in non-oil export volume continues and the underlying level of non-oil import volume seems to have stablised.
